PHRASE.LANG: Pantalones de cazador de la tundra (para hombre)
You've achieved so much, Yetis quake at the very sight of you. [#Legal]
Vous avez accompli tellement de choses. Les yétis tremblent dès qu'ils vous aperçoivent. [#Legal]
Du warst so erfolgreich, dass die Yetis bei deinem bloßen Anblick zittern. [#Legal]
Hai ottenuto una fama tale che gli Yeti tremano alla tua vista. [#Legal]
Has conseguido tantas cosas que los yetis tiemblan al verte. [#Legal]
당신은 너무나 많은 것을 이루었습니다. 설인들은 당신을 보며 두려워합니다. [#Legal]
You've achieved so much, Yetis quake at the very sight of you. [#Legal]
您的成就非凡，傳說的喜馬拉雅山雪人看見您已怕得顫抖。[#Legal]
您的成就非凡，傳說的喜馬拉雅山雪人看見您已怕得顫抖。[#Legal]
You've achieved so much, Yetis quake at the very sight of you. [#Legal]
